game_types.name: Standard
game_types.description: A standard game refers to each standard line of numbers you select for a lotto game. Each standard game you play offers you an equal chance of winning a prize.

game_offers.name: Standard
game_offers.description: This standard game (6 numbers) offers you a chance to win any prize from Division 1 to Division 5.

game_types.name: System
game_types.description: A system allows you to play more numbers than a standard entry providing you with an entry covering every combination of the numbers you have chosen. This type of entry allows players to increase their chances of winning a prize by playing a wider range of number combinations.

game_offers.name: System 10
game_offers.description: This system covers 10 numbers, in all possible 6 number combinations, over 210 games.

game_offers.name: System 11
game_offers.description: This system covers 11 numbers, in all possible 6 number combinations, over 462 games.

game_offers.name: System 12
game_offers.description: This system covers 12 numbers, in all possible 6 number combinations, over 924 games.

game_offers.name: System 13
game_offers.description: This system covers 13 numbers, in all possible 6 number combinations, over 1716 games.

game_offers.name: System 14
game_offers.description: This system covers 14 numbers, in all possible 6 number combinations, over 3003 games.

game_offers.name: System 15
game_offers.description: This system covers 15 numbers, in all possible 6 number combinations, over 5005 games.

game_offers.name: System 16
game_offers.description: This system covers 16 numbers, in all possible 6 number combinations, over 8008 games.

game_offers.name: System 17
game_offers.description: This system covers 17 numbers, in all possible 6 number combinations, over 12,376 games.

game_offers.name: System 18
game_offers.description: This system covers 18 numbers, in all possible 6 number combinations, over 18,564 games.

game_offers.name: Pick 4
game_offers.description: This system covers just 4 numbers instead of the usual 6.  Your 4 selections are combined with each remaining pair of numbers to create the equivalent of 820 standard games of 6 numbers.

game_offers.name: Pick 5
game_offers.description: This system covers just 5 numbers instead of the usual 6.  Your 5 numbers are combined with each of the remaining 40 numbers to create the equivalent of 40 standard games of 6 numbers.

game_offers.name: System 7
game_offers.description: This system covers 7 numbers, in all possible 6 number combinations, over 7 games.

game_offers.name: System 8
game_offers.description: This system covers 8 numbers, in all possible 6 number combinations, over 28 games.

game_offers.name: System 9
game_offers.description: This system covers 9 numbers, in all possible 6 number combinations, over 84 games.

game_types.name: Super Combo
game_types.description: A Super Combo also allows you to select more or less than the standard amount of numbers. Like a system, it offers you an increased chance of winning a prize with your chosen numbers by placing more entries. Although the super combo does not cover all possible combinations of your numbers like a system entry, it still offers you a higher statistical chance of winning a prize than a single standard entry, but at a significantly reduced cost.

game_types.name: Super Combo
game_types.description: A Mega Combo allows you to play 'X' Numbers over 'X' Games. By offering multiple options and combinations, you get to choose how you want to play

game_offers.name: Super Combo
game_offers.description: A Super Combo lets you pick as many numbers as you want. You then choose how many games you want to play. Your picked numbers are then randomly combined across your games. Similar to a System entry except you are not playing every possible combination.

game_types.name: Standard
game_types.description: A standard game refers to each standard line of numbers you select for a lotto game. Each standard game you play offers you an equal chance of winning a prize.

game_offers.name: Standard
game_offers.description: This standard game (7 numbers) offers you a chance to win any prize from Division 1 to Division 7.

game_types.name: System
game_types.description: A system allows you to play more numbers than a standard entry providing you with an entry covering every combination of the numbers you have chosen. This type of entry allows players to increase their chances of winning a prize by playing a wider range of number combinations.

game_offers.name: System 10
game_offers.description: This system covers 10 numbers, in all possible 7 number combinations, equating to 120 games.

game_offers.name: System 11
game_offers.description: This system covers 11 numbers, in all possible 7 number combinations, equating to 330 games.

game_offers.name: System 12
game_offers.description: This system covers 12 numbers, in all possible 7 number combinations, equating to 792 games.

game_offers.name: System 13
game_offers.description: This system covers 13 numbers, in all possible 7 number combinations, equating to 1716 games.

game_offers.name: System 14
game_offers.description: This system covers 14 numbers, in all possible 7 number combinations, equating to 3432 games.

game_offers.name: System 15
game_offers.description: This system covers 15 numbers, in all possible 7 number combinations, equating to 6435 games.

game_offers.name: Pick 5
game_offers.description: This system covers just 5 numbers instead of the usual 7.  Your 5 numbers are combined with combinations of pairs of numbers from the remaining 40 numbers to create the equivalent of 780 standard games of 7 numbers.

game_offers.name: Pick 6
game_offers.description: This system covers just 6 numbers instead of the usual 7.  Your 6 numbers are combined with each of the remaining 39 numbers to create the equivalent of 39 standard games of 7 numbers.

game_offers.name: System 8
game_offers.description: This system covers 8 numbers, in all possible 7 number combinations, equating to 8 games.

game_offers.name: System 9
game_offers.description: This system covers 9 numbers, in all possible 7 number combinations, equating to 36 games.

game_types.name: Super Combo
game_types.description: A Mega Combo allows you to play 'X' Numbers over 'X' Games. By offering multiple options and combinations, you get to choose how you want to play

game_offers.name: Super Combo
game_offers.description: A Super Combo lets you pick as many numbers as you want. You then choose how many games you want to play. Your picked numbers are then randomly combined across your games. Similar to a System entry except you are not playing every possible combination.

game_types.name: Standard
game_types.description: A standard game refers to each standard line of numbers you select for a lotto game. Each standard game you play offers you an equal chance of winning a prize.

game_offers.name: Standard
game_offers.description: This standard game (6 numbers plus a Powerball) offers you a chance to win any prize from Division 1 to Division 8.

game_types.name: System
game_types.description: A system allows you to play more numbers than a standard entry providing you with an entry covering every combination of the numbers you have chosen. This type of entry allows players to increase their chances of winning a prize by playing a wider range of number combinations.

game_offers.name: System 10
game_offers.description: This system covers all possible 6-number combinations of your 10 numbers, plus your chosen Powerball, equivalent to 210 standard games.

game_offers.description: This system covers all possible 6-number combinations of your 11 numbers, plus your chosen Powerball, equivalent to 462 standard games.

game_offers.name: System 20
game_offers.description: This system covers all possible 6-number combinations of your 20 numbers, plus your chosen Powerball, equivalent to 38,760 standard games.

game_offers.name: Pick 4
game_offers.description: This system covers possible 6-number combinations from your chosen 4 numbers and powerball, It uses the remaining 36 main numbers as the 5th and 6th numbers. A Pick 4 entry is equivalent to 630 standard games.

game_offers.name: Pick 5
game_offers.description: This system covers all possible 6-number combinations from your chosen 5 numbers and powerball. It uses the remaining 35 main numbers as the 6th number. A Pick 5 entry is equivalent to 35 standard games.

game_offers.name: System 7
game_offers.description: This system covers all possible 6-number combinations of your 7 numbers, plus your chosen Powerball, equivalent to 7 standard games.

game_types.name: PowerHit
game_types.description: Powerhit increases your chances of winning a Powerball game by automatically playing every possible Powerball number.

game_offers.name: PowerHit Standard
game_offers.description: This standard game (6 numbers plus a Powerball) offers you a chance to win any prize from Division 1 to Division 8. This PowerHit game includes every possible Powerball for more chances to win.

game_types.name: PowerHit
game_types.description: PowerHit ticket increases your chance of winning Powerball by automatically playing every possible Powerball number. Youll choose 6 numbers from 1 to 40 and the computer will use these numbers across 20 games  one for every possible Powerball number.

game_offers.name: PowerHit System 10
game_offers.description: This system covers 10 numbers in all possible 6 number combinations, in addition to all Powerball combinations. The PowerHit System 10 is the equivalent of 210 powerhit games, or 4,200 standard panels.

game_offers.name: PowerHit System 11
game_offers.description: This system covers 11 numbers in all possible 6 number combinations, in addition to all Powerball combinations. The PowerHit System 11 is the equivalent of 462 powerhit games, or 9,240 standard panels.

game_offers.name: PowerHit System 12
game_offers.description: This system covers 12 numbers in all possible 6 number combinations, in addition to all Powerball combinations. The PowerHit System 12 is the equivalent of 924 powerhit games, or 18,480 standard panels.

game_offers.name: PowerHit Pick 5
game_offers.description: This system covers 5 main numbers, combined with each of the remaining 35 main numbers, in addition to all Powerball combinations. The PowerHit Pick 5 is the equivalent of 35 PowerHit games, or 700 standard panels.

game_offers.name: PowerHit System 7
game_offers.description: This system covers 7 numbers in all possible 6 number combinations, in addition to all Powerball combinations. The PowerHit System 7 is the equivalent of 7 powerhit games, or 140 standard panels.

game_offers.name: PowerHit System 8
game_offers.description: This system covers 8 numbers in all possible 6 number combinations, in addition to all Powerball combinations. The PowerHit System 8 is the equivalent of 28 powerhit games, or 560 standard panels.

game_offers.name: PowerHit System 9
game_offers.description: This system covers 9 numbers in all possible 6 number combinations, in addition to all Powerball combinations. The PowerHit System 9 is the equivalent of 84 powerhit games, or 1,680 standard panels.

game_types.name: Sequential
game_types.description: Numbers will be purchased in sequential order.

game_offers.name: Sequential
game_offers.description: Purchase sequential ticket numbers.

game_types.name: Random
game_types.description: Numbers will be purchased in random order.

game_offers.name: Random
game_offers.description: Purchase random ticket numbers.

game_offers.name: Pick 4
game_offers.description: This system covers just 4 numbers instead of the usual 6.  Your 4 selections are combined with each remaining pair of numbers to create the equivalent of 820 standard games of 6 numbers.

game_offers.name: Pick 5
game_offers.description: This system covers just 5 numbers instead of the usual 6.  Your 5 numbers are combined with each of the remaining 40 numbers to create the equivalent of 40 standard games of 6 numbers.

game_types.name: Super Combo
game_types.description: A Super Combo also allows you to select more or less than the standard amount of numbers. Like a system, it offers you an increased chance of winning a prize with your chosen numbers by placing more entries. Although the super combo does not cover all possible combinations of your numbers like a system entry, it still offers you a higher statistical chance of winning a prize than a single standard entry, but at a significantly reduced cost.

game_types.name: Super Combo
game_types.description: A Mega Combo allows you to play 'X' Numbers over 'X' Games. By offering multiple options and combinations, you get to choose how you want to play

game_offers.name: Super Combo
game_offers.description: A Super Combo lets you pick as many numbers as you want. You then choose how many games you want to play. Your picked numbers are then randomly combined across your games. Similar to a System entry except you are not playing every possible combination.

game_types.name: Sequential
